comments:
Exception throws out when open an example report design.

build version:
2.2.2 v20071130-0630

steps to reproduce:
1. Open Birt.
2. Show report examples view.
3. Select ScriptedDatasourceExampleAfter.rptdesign from Scripting->Scripted Data Source folder.
4. Open it.

Expected result: No exception.

Actual result: Exception throws out.

Error log:
